message.body: on tuesday and dad cant make it for fathers day. gf's in chemo. wanted to surprise him with a "driveway" movie at his house instead. any ideas?
hi santana! this is a long story but would you by any chance be able to help me find/rent/borrow a projector. cool hand luke is playing at the drive in

Dang, that sounds like a really nice idea. Not quite sure if I actually know anybody that owns a projector though. I think the best idea would be to get one at Best Buy, use it for the night and then just return it the next day. Shouldn't be a problem. Just double check their policy. I don't see it being an issue as long as yr gentle with it.
OH! that is a fantastic idea! thank you!!
